2025.context: Microsoft Corporation is a technology company focused on cloud computing, productivity software, gaming, and AI. AI leader with Copilot. Azure growing. Gaming consolidated.

competitors.name: Amazon Web Services (AWS)
competitors.notes: Primary cloud computing competitor, holds 30-33% market share vs Azure's 20-21%. Has faced capacity constraints in late 2025, allowing Microsoft to gain ground.

competitors.name: Google Cloud Platform (GCP)
competitors.notes: Major cloud computing rival, benefiting from AWS capacity constraints. Competing aggressively in the AI and cloud infrastructure space.

competitors.name: Salesforce
competitors.notes: Enterprise software competitor with Agentforce platform. Faces complex transition as per-conversation pricing model threatens traditional per-seat licensing revenue.

competitors.name: Oracle
